tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have had numerous dental appointments with Dr. Sourabh Nagpal for our entire family, and he has been our primary dental care provider for many years. He has done an outstanding job of caring for us all with patience and care. Dr. Nagpal has always been attentive to our concerns, explained the issues, and provided excellent care. Our association with him goes back to when our daughter was a toddler, and since then, we have been loyal patients at his clinic. 
- Aanya, Manju & Nishant

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
** *** **** ** ********** ******* **** ******** ******* ***** ****** ** *** ****** **** ***** ******* ** *** ***** *** **** * ***** *********** ***** **** *** ** ****** **** * ****** ***** *** * ****** ******** ** **** ******** *** ** *** *** * **** ****** Now, that's only the first part of the process. 

He is also not very transparent about the charges either. Now you will ask how much you will have to dish out for that and he will display a chart that says an X amount. And you will think that's how much I am spending for it. But wait, that's only the token amount. He will keep bringing additional charges for various stages of the root canal process. For instance after 3 visits, he will say something like" now i will have to insert a fiber support to strengthen your teeth. That will cost an additional 6K or something". If that was a part of the root canal process that should already have been included in the bill amount.

Anyways, now is the time for crowning. Either you opt for a metallic crown or a ceramic. I opted for the ceramic one with a 5 years warranty. But when it was time for me to get the crown fitted, he said "the 5 year cover has recently become invalid so I have made the 10 year plan for you. This will cost you 3K extra". I didn't make much of a fuss about it back then because it was already at the back of my mind to go for the years plan. But still I felt like he should have at least given me a prior update and taken my consent before going ahead with the new plan. What if I wasn't willing to dish away the additional charges? 

Now after almost 3 months I still feel although very minimal but still some kind of a sensitivity in my crowning area. I also opted for deep cleaning. Even here he chose to give a miss to those areas where it's not visible. And now as I got a reminder from Matrix Dental Clinic via Practo for a routine/follow up check I decided to review the place and inform that I don't know about others but "I am finding another dentist for my future visits". 

I am still giving it a 2 rather than 1 star because the receptionist was a 
cooperative and sensible lady.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Horrible experience! Root canal was declared to be 'not possible' after two long, invasive and painful sittings! The very next day i consulted a senior dentist who immediately located the canals and successfully completed the root canal. At Matrix it was the most painful and panic ridden time I ever experienced on the dental table. **** *** *** **** ********** ********** ********* *** the best is, the dentist perforated the non-canal areas of the tooth ***** ** ******* ******* Dubious and unreliable messaging. ********* ** **** ** ****** ****** The most abysmal dental experience of my life! *** **** ******* ***** ** ***** * * ***** ** ********* ***********

We visited the clinic for getting our dental implants done and Dr.Saurabh Nagpal was very helpful in explaining each and every step involved each OPG CBCT to us so that the case becomes clear to us.Costs involved were briefed to us beforehand. He told us to go for All-On-4. The tooth extraction and dental implant placement went very very smoothly. There was no major pain / complications as such. Doctor gave us a healing time of 15 days and that was a blessing. No bleeding nothing .After 15 days he placed the temporary prosthesis and we're all good for next 4 months till our permanent prosthesis will be placed. 
All in all i recommend this clinic and specially Dr. Saurabh. The most helpful,calm,down-to-earth,patient and well communicating doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Great experience. The clinic is well sanitized and all the staff had proper ppe kits. The waiting time was minimal. The doctor was friendly and he made me very comfertable. He too was wearing full ppe kit and he sees no two patients with the same ppe kit on. He made me understand my x-rays and the line of treatment, cost and time its was going to take. my session lasted nearly 1 hr 15 mins and the doctor was very supportive and patient throughout the surgical extraction process. After the procedure, the team explained to me post-care and medication in detail. They even sent me post-care instructions on whatsapp which is pretty neat. Overall, a great facility with very professional staff and a great doctor. Definitely and highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been a patient of Dr Sourav Nagpal for the past  5 years. Total 4 visits I have made. Last visit was on Dec 2023. I’ve always loved his skilled work, he is a perfectionist! He is compassionate and very professional. I know I’m in good hands with Dr Sourav and his staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Great experience. Must visit. You won't have to wait for too long. The doctor is very friendly, punctual,  skilled, and knowledgeable. Moreover, he doesn't hurry the treatment process. The clinic and its practices are safe. The other members at the clinic are also very friendly and will answer all your questions. I had my RCT done by the doctor recently and it went well. I'll update my review about the same once everything gets back to normal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Surgical Tooth Extraction, Teeth cleaning & polishing,
review: We went there for our daughter(6 yrs old). Many doctor suggested RCT for her problem which is quite painful. So, we were really not sure about that but thankfully, we discussed it with Dr Saurabh Nagpal. He strongly suggested that it would be good to wait for sometime( considering her age) and RCT might not be required as her milk teeth would fall by themselves. We followed his advice and it really happened the way he suggested.  We are so glad to have him as our doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Orthodontic Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,RCT - Root Canal Treatment, fixed retainers,
review: Dr. Sourabh Nagpal explained the issues in very simple clear words and provided the options clearly. We continued with the treatment which we agreed upon. Throughout the treatment, Dr. Nagpal and his team did an amazing job. There was a situation where I needed an appointment for every single day in the week. Dr. Nagpal and his team helped me in every possible way. ** ** **** **** ****** *** he has a very professional and punctual team with him. I will definitely recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My treatment experience was amazing with doctor Nagpal, he suggested all the possible options which I could go for my aligners treatment.  Best thing about him is he explains everything in layman's language , which is of great help for the patients. If you have any doubt regarding treatment just ask him. :) **** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am really happy my son advised me to visit Matrix. Root canal done by Dr Poonam was marvellous without much pain delicately done and well explained and executed at every stage. It was worth my money spent. I had to undergo a detailed front teeth treatment of 6 teeth but Dr Nagpal and Dr Mrs Nagpal made me feel like a queen each time I went for an appointment with utmost pampering too to ease my pain if any.It was a very good experience and indeed Dr Saurabh is an artist of teeth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It has been a great experience with doctor. He is always there to help. His friendliness has always made me comfortable *** * ***** *** *** **** ****** *** ****** ********* ** ****** Highly recommended. If you have any kind of dental issue he will surely resolve it.
Good hand in dealing procedure, explained cause effect and cost clearly helped in fast decision. Clinic as well as waiting lounge clean soothing. A good location away from crowd .
Doctor is very friendly and explained the situation quite well. There are very few doctors who are staright fowrd and give right suggestion to the patient,happy to consult with him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to Dr Nagpal for the treatment and fixing of two upper central incisors (teeths) of my 10 year old son which he had broken by felling down. My wife and I had so much  tension and apprehension since both the teeths were his  permanent teeths. But,  after the one month of treatment, we are now totally relieved.  Everything now appears to be normal. It was possible due to Dr Nagpal.  His abilty to explain regarding the issues and further treatment plans are noteworthy. My wife and I very much appreciate the skills and the care he has brought to the treatment of my son. We feel most fortunate to have him as doctor of my son. ** *** ***** ** ** ********* *** **** ****** ** ****** ******

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Amazing experience! It was a pleasant experience. I’m highly satisfied. I’m leaving with great results and good smile.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Saurabh treatment procedures are very accurate. He understands the problem and treats the patient accordingly. 
I visited him for teeth gap filling and reshaping of teeth. He did a marvelous job there, I was happy in first go.

I was very scared , but he doctor helped me calm down and took the tooth very easily without me feeling pain. Great service by the doctor.  He is also very patient and listens to the patient without any interruption.

review: Visited recently for tooth extraction amid Covid concerns. I must appreciate the level of precautions taken by the clinic. I was extremely happy with the explanation, cordiality, professionalisms and post surgery follow ups. Much appreciated.

review:
I appreciate that doctors explained the details of procedures. They told what we are doing and why we’re doing it.
The procedures went smoothly.
Appointments were flexible.
Proper hygiene was maintained.
There was an assistant for taking x-rays, doing the suction etc.
Most of the times, there was no waiting time at all.

Overall, the experience was definitely satisfactory and upto my expectations.

review: I had visited for tooth ache issue. The tooth had infection. However this doctor suggested implant of teeth *** ******* ***** ****** **** ********** * ****** ********** Due to immense pain i listened to him *** ** ********* **** ****** **** *** ******** please don't go.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited doctor Sourabh second time now for from tooth treatment. He is very friendly and gives every details about the problem and treatment in advance which makes. His level of knowledge is really great and would love to recommend him for any teeth related issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Had been a wonderful experience, staff was supportive and I am 100% satisfied with their work.
I had stains on my teeth, while other dental clinics were recommending to go for veneers and orthodontic treatment, Dr Sourabh was the one who convinced me that it's just 30 mins treatment and much more cost effective rather than going for ₹20k veneers. Had clinic was well maintained and hygienic in times of covid and now too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was patient in understand the issues I had, and also took time to explain the treatments. Prices were made transparent before the treatments. I had to make several appointments for the entire treatments and all went well. Things went as expected and the final results are satisfactory and natural looking. Happy overall. Would definitely recommend Dr. Sourabh due to his experience, expertise and friendly nature.
